en:
The PGCert offers **full-time** and **part-time** programmes. 
The full-time PGCertInfoTech programme is quite intensive and fast-moving.


If you’re completely new to programming, you might want to consider the part-time programme as it offers more time to grasp key concepts. That said, the PGCertInfoTech doesn’t assume prior knowledge – but it does require a committed approach.                                                                                                                                                   Since the part-time delivery is evening-based, it’s suited to students who wish to keep their day jobs while they study.
I’m interested in studying the Postgraduate Certificate in Information Technology. Should I take the full-time or part-time programme?
Whats the difference between the full-time and part-time programme
I do not have enough time to study full-time.
I have a part-time job that I want to keep.
I don't have a lot of time but want to complete this certificate
can I do the PGCert part time?
